stadium.name: The Su'akour Bowl
stadium.description: A crude, rowdy stadium built within the half-finished, black-stone walls of the warlord Su'akour's abandoned fortress. The stands are crumbling ruins, and the entire arena perpetually stinks of the nearby sulfur marshes.

stats.pregame_ritual: Kissing their biceps and whispering words of encouragement to them.
Getting a teammate to punch them in the shoulder, hard.
Wearing their boots on the wrong feet during the warm-up.
Washing their hands with dirt.
Asking a teammate to tell them a story, but only the beginning.
Asking the referee to bless their weapon.
Finding the muddiest puddle and stomping in it with bare feet.
Staring at a single blade of grass until their eyes water.
Wiping a teammate's sweat onto their own forehead.
Attempting to communicate with birds.
Consulting a folk rhyme about the weather to predict the game's outcome.
Getting a teammate to punch them in the shoulder, hard.

stadium.name: The Guilder's Field
stadium.description: An opulent stadium sponsored by the powerful Merchant's Guild. The stands feature luxurious, velvet-lined boxes for bankers, who are often more focused on making deals than the game.

stats.pregame_ritual: Washing their hands with dirt.
Eating a dandelion, stem and all.
Lighting a small piece of parchment on fire and inhaling the smoke.
Meticulously cleaning each stud on their boots with a special brush.
Eating a raw onion, layer by layer, without crying.
Getting a teammate to pour a bucket of cold water over their head.
A team-wide moment of absolute silence to 'gather their thoughts'.
Sharpening the edges of their blunted weapon (an exercise in futility).
Humming a tune they believe only they know.
Lighting a small piece of parchment on fire and inhaling the smoke.
Avoiding eye contact with anyone wearing the color green.

preGame:
Good evening, sports fans, and welcome to another bone-crushing edition of **Tuesday Night Trollball**! üéôÔ∏èüëπ This is your favorite demon announcer, **Nok the Corrupter**, broadcasting LIVE from the sulfur-choked ruins of the **Su'akour Bowl**! Let me tell you, folks, the air down here is thick enough to chew‚Äîit smells like rotten eggs, swamp gas, and impending violence! The walls are crumbling, the ground is uneven, and the local fumes are absolutely noxious! It is a BEAUTIFUL night for a brawl! üèüÔ∏èüíÄ

Tonight, we have a clash of cultures that promises to get messy! In the visiting corner, representing the **Guild of the Black Sky**, we have **The New Prosperity Profits**! üí∞ These folks are here to prove that money *can* buy victory, provided you spend it on heavy weaponry! I was watching their warm-ups earlier, and I saw **Yoshi Cathy** eating a raw onion‚Äîlayer by layer! üßÖ No tears, just pure, psychopathic focus! And keep an eye on **Gladdie Farika**; they spent twenty minutes meticulously cleaning the studs on their boots. You only get them that clean if you plan to stomp them into someone's face! Ha-ha!

Facing them are the home team, **The Brimstone Fire Eaters**! üî• These warriors are sponsored by the so-called 'heroes' of **Eponore**‚Äîyou know, **Sir Tanos** and **Artorias**? Ugh. But don't hold that against the players! **Nachison Icken** is out there right now, and I swear they are wearing their boots on the wrong feet! Is it a curse? A tactical decision? Or just plain old-fashioned confusion? Who cares, as long as they hit someone! üë¢üí•

The healers are prepping their salts, the crowd is drunk on cheap ale and sulfur fumes, and the Trollball is leathery and heavy! Grab a drink and find cover, folks, because it's time for the violence! Let's PLAY BALL! üèàü©∏
postGame:
HOLY HELLS, WHAT A GAME! ü§Ø Put down your tankards and pick up your jaws, folks, because we just witnessed a defensive grinder that exploded into a **4-2 OVERTIME VICTORY** for **The New Prosperity Profits**! The Brimstone Fire Eaters fought hard here in the ruins, but in the end, the gold-plated aggression of the Guild took the day!

The second half started with a tension so thick you could cut it with a Zweihander! Both teams came out of the locker rooms looking to hurt someone, and boy, did they deliver! **Faina Hendrix** of the Profits wasted no time, lining up **Bollinger Susette** and delivering a tackle so hard I think I felt it up here in the booth! CRUNCH! üí• Bollinger went down, and the medics had to scrape them off the uneven turf. That's how you start a half, folks!

But the Profits weren't done there! Oh no! **Pellikka Concettina**, wielding that spear with malicious intent, spotted **Oona Jane** trying to make a play. Pellikka didn't just stop them; they absolutely leveled them! üöë Oona Jane was out cold before they hit the ground! Two injuries in quick succession! The Profits came out looking like a team possessed‚Äîand believe me, I know a thing or two about possession!

The Fire Eaters weren't going to just roll over and die, though! Not in front of their home crowd, amidst the crumbling walls of Su'akour! **Nachison Icken**, despite the potential foot-pain from those swapped boots, went on a rampage! üë¢ They chased down the onion-eater **Yoshi Cathy** and slammed them into the dirt with a vengeance! Yoshi went down hard, and for a second, I thought they were cooked!

Thank the dark powers for **Merissa Mathian**! üíä The Profits' healer was earning her keep tonight, folks. She rushed onto the field, dragged Yoshi back from the brink, and slapped them back into play! Civic engagement at its finest! If only **High Venture Brennen Farno** could heal the economy that fast, am I right? Ha!

The violence kept escalating! **Selimah Tully** of the Fire Eaters decided it was their turn to dance, and they found a partner in **Gladdie Farika**. It wasn't a slow dance, folks! It was a body-slam! üí• Gladdie was INJURED, adding to the pile of bodies on the sideline. The brutality was beautiful! A true testament to the spirit of the game!

Amidst the carnage, there was actually some Trollball being played! **Wylde Jutta** of the Fire Eaters had a golden opportunity to break the deadlock. They lined up a shot from the Away Field... the crowd held its breath... and... MISS! üö´ Wide right! A heartbreaking failure that surely had **Sir Artorias** weeping into his moon-blessed handkerchief somewhere! A missed opportunity that would haunt them!

The game ground its way into **OVERTIME**! ‚è∞ The regulation whistle blew with the scores locked, leaving us all on the edge of our seats! The tension! The drama! The smell of sulfur! The teams took a quick breather, the healers patched up the groaning wounded, and we went right back into the fray for sudden death!

And then, the moment of glory! The Trollball was loose, a slippery leather prize in the mud. **Aufmann Tedric**‚Äîfresh from their pre-game ice bucket challenge‚Äîsnatched it up in Center Field. The defense was scrambling! The exhaustion was setting in! But Tedric? Tedric had ice in their veins! üßä

They wound up, took aim, and LAUNCHED a shot that sailed true through the uprights! **SCORE!** üéØ The New Prosperity Profits win! The Fire Eaters are extinguished! 4 to 2 in Overtime! What a finish!

What a match! **Nikos Thanae** is probably smiling that creepy smile of his right now, counting his winnings. And somewhere in the Guilder's Field, **Cyfnerth the Butcher** is likely shedding a tear of joy at the sheer efficiency of the violence! As for the Fire Eaters? Well, maybe **Sir Tanos** can give them a pep talk about 'trying your best' while they ice their bruises. This is Nok the Corrupter, reminding you to keep your head up and your weapon sharp! Goodnight, Osterra! üåôüëπ
